snippet: When it comes to ballot initiatives, no state outdoes California. Got something the Legislature won't pass? Start gathering signatures.    Which is exactly what happened after the California Legislature refused to pass a bill that would have banne...
lead_paragraph: When it comes to ballot initiatives, no state outdoes California. Got something the Legislature won't pass? Start gathering signatures. Which is exactly what happened after the California Legislature refused to pass a bill that would have banned same-sex marriages in the state and recognition by the state of same-sex marriages performed elsewhere.
abstract: Proponents of California ban against same-sex marriages in state and recognition of same-sex marriages performed elsewhere gather enough signatures to place issue on ballot in statewide election in March 2000; Legislature has thus far refused to pass bill (S)

headline.main: Political Briefing; California to Vote On Gay Marriages
